original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The 2023 Esala Perahera of the Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic in Kandy will take place from the 17th August to 31st August, announced Diyawadana Nilame (Chief lay custodian of the Temple of the Tooth) Pradeeep Nilanga Dela on Wednesday (5).
The announcement was made following a meeting that took place on the Esala Perahera.
According to the official website of the Sri Dalada Maligawa the official perahera dates are as follows:
Final Randoli Perahera / Grand Randoli Procession: 30th August 2023
The water cutting ceremony ( Diya Kapeema): 31st  August 2023
The Netherlands to return looted artifacts from Sri Lanka in Colonial era
